00019 #include <qdialog.h>
00020 #include <qlayout.h>
00021 #include <qlabel.h>
00022 #include <qpushbutton.h>
00023 
00024 #include "config.h"
00025 #include "saveAndClearDialog.h"
00026 
00027 SaveAndClearDialog::SaveAndClearDialog(QWidget *parent, const char *name) : QDialog(parent, name)
00028 {
00029     setCaption("Print Before Saving");
00030 
00031     vBoxLayout = new QVBoxLayout(this, 5, 5, "saveAndClearDialog::vBoxLayout");
00032 
00033     label = new QLabel("<nobr>You have not printed the Journal Entries.</nobr><br>"
00034                        "<nobr>Would you like to print them now?</nobr>",
00035                this, "saveAndClearDialog::label");
00036 
00037     vBoxLayout->addWidget(label);
00038     vBoxLayout->addSpacing(10);
00039 
00040     hBoxLayout = new QHBoxLayout(vBoxLayout, 5, "saveAndClearDialog::hBoxLayout");
00041 
00042     saveButton = new QPushButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/saveAndClear.png")),
00043                                  "Save Without Printing", this, "saveAndClearDialog::saveButton");
00044     connect(saveButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(saveAndClear()));
00045 
00046     printButton = new QPushButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/print.png")),
00047                                      "Print and Save", this, "saveAndClearDialog::printButton");
00048     connect(printButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(printAndSave()));
00049 
00050     dontSaveButton = new QPushButton(QIconSet(QPixmap::fromMimeSource(ICON_PATH + "/cancelButton.png")),
00051                                    "Don't Save and Clear", this, "saveAndClearDialog::dontSaveButton");
00052     connect(dontSaveButton, SIGNAL(clicked()), this, SLOT(dontSave()));
00053 
00054     dontSaveButton->setDefault(true);
00055     dontSaveButton->setFocus();
00056 
00057     hBoxLayout->addStretch();
00058     hBoxLayout->addWidget(saveButton);
00059     hBoxLayout->addWidget(printButton);
00060     hBoxLayout->addWidget(dontSaveButton);
00061 }
00062 
00063 void SaveAndClearDialog::saveAndClear()
00064 {
00065     done(0);
00066 }
00067 
00068 void SaveAndClearDialog::printAndSave()
00069 {
00070     done(1);
00071 }
00072 
00073 void SaveAndClearDialog::dontSave()
00074 {
00075     done(2);
00076 }
